text: Aur jo museebat ussay phonch chuki hai iss kay baad agar hum issay kissi rehmat ka maza chakhayen to woh keh uthta hai kay iss ka to mein haqdaar hi tha aur mein to khayal hi nahi ker sakta kay qayamat qaeem hogi aur agar mein apnay rab kay pass wapis kiya gaya to bhi yaqeenan meray liye uss kay pass bhi behtri hai yaqeenan hum inn kuffaar ko unkay aemaal say khabardaar keren gay aur unhen sakht azab ka maza chakhayen gay
